title: Artem Nazarchuk
subtitle: Frontend Developer
description: I develop fast, scalable, and accessible web applications using React, Next.js, and TypeScript. Passionate about clean code, user-centered design, and continuous learning.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Since 2022, I've been deeply involved in frontend development, starting from HTML and CSS basics to modern JavaScript frameworks. I enjoy solving complex UI challenges and optimizing performance and accessibility.
about.paragraph2: Currently, I'm a computer science student and freelance developer, working on real projects that emphasize scalability, reusability, and multilingual support. I aim to contribute to impactful projects and grow as a developer.

skills.title: Tech Stack & Tools
skills.subtitle: Here's a categorized overview of my current development toolkit. Skills marked with * are actively being learned or deepened.
skills.learningNote: * Technologies marked with an asterisk are currently being learned or improved as part of my full-stack development roadmap.
